name: OS
desc: I work on linux operating system (usually ubuntu). Used vagrant before but now docker is my preferable tool for local development environment.

name: Language
desc: Primarily I work with PHP most of the time, but I use python for scraping and automating tedious task. I occasionally hack on rust and elixir.

name: Framework
desc: Laravel is my go to framework for rapid prototyping. I also use vue and react as a view framework. I've also used meteor framework very briefly.

name: Database
desc: I primarily use mariadb for database and redis for fast data storage. I've briefly used postgresql and mongodb. I've also played with graph database orientdb.

name: Monitoring
desc: I use self-hosted sentry for error tracking. I've also used percona monitoring and management tool for mysql database performance monitoring in professional work.

name: Deployment
desc: I've manually deployed & maintained application before, but now I use docker tools (portainer, docker swarm) for deployment and looking into RancherOS.

name: Server
desc: I use nginx as a http server, previously used apache. I've used AWS (EC2,S3,RDS) services at my workplace, but personally I use DigitalOcean service.

name: Testing
desc: I try to follow TDD most of the time, phpunit for unit testing in php and behat for BDD. Recently started using chromedriver for automated browser testing.

name: Tools
desc: I use git for version controlling. I use TravisCI and StyleCI service for continuous integration. Sublime Text is my primary editor and learning vim.
